page.title: 02Notes on type of coverage.
page.content: This area is remote from our school and with its thinly scattered settlement and paucity of roads it has been difficult to cover in detail as many aspects as we would have wished. Consequently we have included a large number of impressions -particularly poetry. The district has its own poets for at Piedmont lives Michael Horovitz and his son Adam;Laurie Lee came here for nutting and blackberrying (Cider With Rosie p.188)-and Frank Mansell,author of Cotswold Ballads,knew the area intimately. We are fortunate in being able to include poems by the Horovitz's and by Frank Mansell.
